name: HiWave
description:
HiWave is a twin stick shooter with a special mechanic. Pressing the spacebar fires a radial burst that marks enemies, and marked enemies take more damage. The burst attack is on a cooldown, which is represented by a white radial gauge in the middle of the screen.

This is a work in progress so please comment with any feedback you have. I have a lot of balancing, tuning, and tweaking to do, so consider what is here more like a playtest.

Controls:

Aim - Mouse

Shoot - LMB

Move - WASD

Burst - Space Bar
